channel.title: ♔♔♔ Nexile ♔♔♔ We care about the players™ ♔♔♔ Skiller Friendly
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://nexile.info/logo.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Welcome to Nexile , We take care of our players not only via game, but via off-game support. We are not just a server, we are a family, a family of gamers who come together to have a great laugh, and enjoy playing. We don't take things too serious unless of-course you're racist etc.
We are finally open, for Open BETA.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE]
Perfect combat 5+ mini-games 10+ bosses 317 server Great staff team Economy 24/7 Up time Dungeoneering Grand exchange
[SIZE=4]Links:[/SIZE]
Homepage: [url=http://nexile.info]Nexile[/url] Forum: [url=http://nexile.info/forum]Sign In - Nexile RSPS[/url] Client: [URL=http://"http://nexile.info/client.jar"]http://nexile.info/client.jar[/URL]
[SIZE=5] Media [/COLOR]
[SPOIL] Bank Search [IMG]http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/pkvrCmO.png[/img]
Price checker [IMG]http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/lMs65dD.png[/img]
Misc [IMG]http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/x29lNhU.png[/img]
